name: assignee_bot
description: True if the given assignee is identified as a bot.

name: assignee_domain
description: Domain associated to the assignee in SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_gender
description: Assignee gender, based on her name (disabled by default).

name: assignee_gender_acc
description: Assignee gender accuracy (disabled by default).

name: assignee_id
description: Assignee ID from SortingHat.

name: assignee_login
description: Assignee's login name from GitLab.

name: assignee_multi_org_names
description: List of the assignee organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_name
description: Assignee name.

name: assignee_org_name
description: Assignee organization name.

name: assignee_user_name
description: Assignee user name from SortingHat.

name: assignee_uuid
description: Assignee UUID from SortingHat.

name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot, from SortingHat profile.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_gender
description: Author gender, based on her name (disabled by default).

name: author_gender_acc
description: Author gender accuracy (disabled by default).

name: author_id
description: Author ID from SortingHat.

name: author_login
description: Author's login name from GitLab.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: author_name
description: Author name.

name: author_org_name
description: Author organization name.

name: author_user_name
description: Author user name from SortingHat.

name: author_uuid
description: Author UUID from SortingHat.

name: body
description: Body of the issue/comment.

name: body_analyzed
description: Body of the issue/comment.

name: comment_updated_at
description: Date when the comment was updated.

name: gitlab_repo
description: The name of the GitLab repository.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Issue/comment creation date.

name: id
description: Issue/comment ID.

name: is_gitlab_comment
description: Used to unify issue and issue comments.

name: is_gitlab_issue
description: Used to separate issues from comments.

name: is_gitlab_issue_comment
description: Used to separate comments from issues.

name: issue_closed_at
description: Date when an issue was closed.

name: issue_created_at
description: Date when an issue was opened.

name: issue_id
description: Issue ID on GitLab.

name: issue_id_in_repo
description: The issue's ID in the repository.

name: issue_labels
description: The labels assigned to an issue.

name: issue_state
description: State of the issue (open/closed).

name: issue_title
description: The title of the issue.

name: issue_title_analyzed
description: Issue title split by terms to allow searching.

name: issue_updated_at
description: Date when the issue was last updated.

name: issue_url
description: Full URL of the issue.

name: item_type
description: The type of the item (issue/comment).

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the data were enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in ElasticSearch raw index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: origin
description: The original URL from which the repository was retrieved from.

name: project
description: Project name.

name: project_1
description: Used if more than one project levels are allowed in the project hierarchy.

name: reactions.count
description: Number of reactions of a given type.

name: reactions.type
description: Name of reaction to comment/issue.

name: reactions_total_count
description: Total number of reactions to comment/issue.

name: repository
description: Repository name.

name: sub_type
description: Type of the comment (issue comment).

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: time_open_days
description: Time the item is open counted in days.

name: time_to_close_days
description: Time to close an issue counted in days.

name: time_to_first_attention
description: Time to first attention to an issue counted in days.

name: title_analyzed
description: Issue title split by by terms to allow searching.

name: url
description: Url of the issue/comment.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
